text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though Narita Brian's poor health<n>persists, Hishi
Amazon believes in<n>her—and doubles down on
her own<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian suffers a crushing defeat at<n>the
autumn Tenno Sho. The audience is<n>aghast by
how weak she is now, and<n>their expectations
begin to fade...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But during an interview before the Japan<n>Cup,
Hishi Amazon declares to everyone<n>that her rival
is Narita Brian, and Narita<n>Brian alone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's adamant that her rival will make a<n>
comeback. The conviction rubs off on<n>the public,
restoring some of their faith.
